title: Soldier With Great Maneuvers , The, La Soldatessa Alle Grandi Manovre 1978

sources.title: Soldier With Great Maneuvers , The, La Soldatessa Alle Grandi Manovre 1978
sources.description: Army Doctor Eva Marini wants to join a regiment to secure equal rights for women. So her commanding officer sends her off to a boot camp led by Renzo Montagnani, where only the most unruly soldiers end up. This is probably the right cast and movie. There were a couple made with basically the same cast and plot. Edwige Fenech joins the army in one and she is a nurse in the other.Â  Italian with optional English subtitles
